detail_desc: Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and padded, detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, diagonal side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Jacket in stretch, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in stretch, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt side pockets. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Jacket in lightweight, patterned, stretch cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins, a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in airy jersey.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in lightweight denim with side and back pockets and a frill-trimmed waist with elastication at the back and sewn-on bow at the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fluffy knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fluffy knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy denim. High waist with pleats at the top, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy denim. High waist with pleats at the top, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and straight legs.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Calf-length culottes in washed, stretch denim. High waist with wide, gathered elastication, and straight, wide legs with a seam and frill trim at the hems.
Jacket in washed, stretch cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high paper bag waist. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist, a fastening with two buttons at the front and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in lightweight denim with side and back pockets and a frill-trimmed waist with elastication at the back and sewn-on bow at the front.
Short jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, tabs with adjustable buttoning at the back, and buttoned cuffs.

Hooded, partially-padded running jacket with sections in water-repellent functional fabric, sleeves in stretch jersey and reflective details. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a chest pocket with a taped zip, and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
